property.name: listName
property.label: List Name
property.description: Optional - Name of the related list

property.name: icon
property.label: List Icon
property.description: Optional - List to be shown in icon, format list:iconName https://www.lightningdesignsystem.com/icons/

property.name: displayFields
property.label: Display Fields
property.description: Mandatory - Comma-separated API names of fields to display

property.name: clickableField
property.label: Clickable Field
property.description: Optional - API name of the fields you want to be clickable and go to the new record. (This field will be non-editable, Field must be a text field.)

property.name: filterData
property.label: Filter Data
property.description: Optional - Add filters to the data - SOQL Sintax. Example: Name != 'TestName' AND Recordtype.Name = 'TestRecordtype'
